con:testCase.name: BadCases-DEV-CAMT054.001.08-CREDIT-Pain001
con:testCase.con:description: Charge customer with unknown, not registered and emtpy MSISDN from camt54 file Based on user story: https://jira.telefonica.de/browse/DRC-4868 camt054.001.08 format is used.

con:testStep.name: 4560N_Run TestCase-CreateFile-CAMT54-Credit-MSISDN-Empty
con:testStep.con:description: Load file and exec all camt jobs

con:testStep.name: 4570N_Run TestCase-CreateFile-CAMT54-Credit-MSISDN-OCS-Error=91
con:testStep.con:description: Load file and exec all camt jobs

con:testStep.name: 4580N_Run TestCase-CreateFile-CAMT54-Credit-MSISDN-OCS-Error=98800006
con:testStep.con:description: Load file and exec all camt jobs

con:configuration.token: Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: ${#TestCase#MSISDN-Unknown}
Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: ${#TestCase#MSISDN-Deactivating}
Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: ${#TestCase#MSISDN-InActive}
Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: ${#TestCase#MSISDN-OCS-Error-98800006}
Piranha-StackService.getStackDetails: Return response for request with MSISDN: ${#TestCase#MSISDN-OCS-Error-91}
OCS10-BalanceManagement.rechargeAccount: Return response for request with msisdn ${#TestCase#MSISDN-OCS-Error-98800006}
OCS10-BalanceManagement.rechargeAccount: Return response for request with msisdn ${#TestCase#MSISDN-OCS-Error-91}

con:configuration.query: SELECT * FROM ( Select C.ID, C.TOPUP_ID, C.END_TO_END_ID, C.REMITTANCE_INFORMATION From CAMT05400102_INPUT_ENTRY C Where C.DRC_STATUS!='CREDIT_FAILED' Order By C.ID DESC) WHERE RowNum<5

con:request.name: 4640P-GUI-Service-paybackCamt054Transaction
con:request.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:type="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/" xmlns:v1="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/drcgui/v1/">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <v1:paybackCamt054Transaction>\r <!--type: long-->\r <camt05400102InputEntyId>${4630N_DataSource-GetIDsFromCAMTFiles#ID}</camt05400102InputEntyId>\r <!--type: string-->\r <comment>Test: Return amount with pain001 file. MSISDN is not assignable.</comment>\r </v1:paybackCamt054Transaction>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>

con:config.con:query: Select PARAMETERS From TASK WHERE TASK_TYPE_ID=9 AND ID=(SELECT MAX(ID) From TASK)
SELECT * From (SELECT ID, Content FROM SEPA_FILE_CONTENT ORDER BY ID DESC) WHERE ROWNUM=1

con:configuration.content: <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8'?><Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.001.001.03" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:iso:std:iso:20022:tech:xsd:pain.001.001.03 pain.001.001.03.xsd"><CstmrCdtTrfInitn><GrpHdr><MsgId>*</MsgId><CreDtTm>${#Project#Date_Current_yyyy-MM-dd}T*</CreDtTm><NbOfTxs>4</NbOfTxs><CtrlSum>40.00</CtrlSum><InitgPty><Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm></InitgPty></GrpHdr><PmtInf><PmtInfId>PAYMENT*</PmtInfId><PmtMtd>TRF</PmtMtd><BtchBookg>false</BtchBookg><NbOfTxs>4</NbOfTxs><CtrlSum>40.00</CtrlSum><PmtTpInf><SvcLvl><Cd>SEPA</Cd></SvcLvl></PmtTpInf><ReqdExctnDt>*</ReqdExctnDt><Dbtr><Nm>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-AccountName}</Nm></Dbtr><DbtrAcct><Id><IBAN>${#Project#ChargeCustomer-1-1-IBAN}</IBAN></Id></DbtrAcct><DbtrAgt><FinInstnId><Othr><Id>NOTPROVIDED</Id></Othr></FinInstnId></DbtrAgt><ChrgBr>SLEV</ChrgBr><CdtTrfTxInf><PmtId><EndToEndId>*</EndToEndId></PmtId><Amt><InstdAmt Ccy="EUR">10.00</InstdAmt></Amt><Cdtr><Nm>*Testueberweisung CAMT54 Credit</Nm></Cdtr><CdtrAcct><Id><IBAN>${#Project#Customer-IBAN}</IBAN></Id></CdtrAcct><RmtInf><Ustrd>*Rueckzahlung*Telefonnummer
